channel.title: Audrey Taylor on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Audrey Taylor on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: How can we effectively engage with harder to reach older people?
item.description: VM - Vivien Moffat SC - Sarah Currie BM -Betty Milton AT - Audrey Taylor GP - Gerry Power AM - Agnes McGroarty Plan P: New approaches to prevention with older people is an Iriss project which addresses the issue of social isolation and loneliness amongst older people. Each quarter the advisory group records a group discussion about a related aspect of prevention. This is the fourth discussion - How can we effectively engage with hard to reach older people?

item.title: What does prevention mean in an ageing population?
item.description: AT - Audrey Taylor JR - Jackie Reid JP - Jerry Power IW - Irene Wheaton EC - Emma Collins DY - Derek Young Plan P: New Approaches to prevention with older people, is a new Iriss project which addresses the issue of social isolation and loneliness amongst older people. Each quarter the project advisory group records a group discussion about a related aspect of prevention. This is the first discussion - 'What does prevention mean in an ageing population?
